comment.text: This translation key is used for the title of a contextual menu button that displays link actions when hovered over or right-clicked on a file, typically in an archive folder. The content will be displayed as "Show link actions" and serves to notify users about the available actions related to links within the file.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Keçid hərəkətlərini göstərin' is a literal translation and not the most natural way to express 'Show link actions' in Azerbaijani. A more idiomatic translation would be 'Bağlantı hərəkətlərini göstər' or 'Bağlantı hərəkətlərini aç'.

The translation "Ցույց տալ հղման գործողությունները" is a literal translation that doesn't quite capture the intended meaning of 'Show link actions'. It sounds clunky and overly formal in Armenian. A more natural translation would convey the functionality of displaying options related to a link.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A better translation might be something like "Ցուցադրել հղման ընտրանքները" or "Ցուցադրել հղման գործողություններ" (depending on the specific context and desired level of formality).  Both convey the idea of showing options or actions associated with a link.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Mostra azioni di link' is understandable, a more natural and accurate translation would be 'Mostra azioni sui link' or 'Mostra le azioni dei link'. 'Di link' isn't the most idiomatic way to express 'of links' in this context.

The translation "링크 작업 표시" is a literal translation of "Show link actions" but doesn't convey the intended meaning naturally in Korean. It sounds awkward and might be misinterpreted as 'display link tasks' rather than 'show options or actions related to a link'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural and accurate translation would be something like "링크 작업 표시" (Link Actions Show) or "링크 관련 작업 표시" (Show link related actions) or potentially a more contextualized phrase depending on the UI.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ສະແດງການດໍາເນີນການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່' is a literal translation but doesn't fully capture the intended meaning of 'Show link actions.' It sounds overly formal and technical. A more natural translation would be something along the lines of 'ສະແດງຕົວເລືອກເຊື່ອມຕໍ່' or 'ສະແດງການກະ ທຳ ກ່ຽວກັບລິ້ງກ์'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ສະແດງຕົວເລືອກເຊື່ອມຕໍ່

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Pokaż działania linku' while understandable, is not the most natural or idiomatic way to say 'Show link actions' in Polish. A more accurate and natural translation would be 'Wyświetl akcje linku' or 'Pokaż menu akcji linku'.
The translation 'Afișare acțiuni asupra link-ului' is a bit literal and not the most natural way to express 'Show link actions' in Romanian. It sounds slightly clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Acțiuni pentru link' or 'Opțiuni pentru link' for a more fluent and natural translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Prikaži dejanja povezav" is a literal translation but not the most natural or idiomatic way to express "Show link actions" in Slovenian. A better translation would convey the intended functionality.

The translation "Прикажи радње линка" is a literal translation and doesn't convey the intended meaning of "Show link actions" in a natural way for a user interface. "Show" implies a display or presentation of actions. "Прикажи" is more like 'display' or 'show off', which might not be the best fit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Покажи опције линка" (Show link options) or "Отвори мени радњи линка" (Open link actions menu) which might better convey the intended function.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "Prikaži radnje linka" is a bit literal and doesn't flow naturally in Serbian. A more idiomatic translation would convey the action of displaying options related to a link.

The translation "Bağlantı işlemlerini göster" is a literal translation but doesn't quite capture the intended meaning of "Show link actions." It sounds more like 'Display link operations' rather than showing available actions on a link.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like "Bağlantı eylemlerini göster" or "Bağlantı seçeneklerini göster".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Hiển thị hành động với liên kết" is a literal translation and not the most natural phrasing in Vietnamese. While technically correct, it's not idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Hiển thị các tùy chọn liên kết" or "Hiển thị thao tác trên liên kết" for a more natural-sounding translation.
